jhelp.gui

Class FontChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • jhelp.gui.FontChooser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener

    public class FontChooser
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    Font chooser.
    It link to a dialog to be able to popup stand alone
    For a compact version see FontChooserCompact

    Last modification : 12 mai 2009
    Version 0.0.0
    Author:
    JHelp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
